about.name: Alfonso Lai
about.description: I'm a fresh graduate student from Informatics Engineering study program with GPA 3.89 out of 4.00. Have internship experience as a Web Developer at PT Digital Otoma Solusi for 4 months using Laravel and Vue.js frameworks to develop Data Center Infrastructure Management application.

projects.title: Web-Based Project Management Application
projects.description: This application was developed using Tailwind CSS, Alpine.js, Laravel & Livewire frameworks (TALL Stack).

projects.title: Web-Based Blog Application
projects.description: This application was developed using Vue.js framework, Start Bootstrap template and Firebase.

projects.title: Web-Based Online Donation Application
projects.description: This application was developed using Laravel framework, Tailwind CSS framework and Payment Gateway Midtrans.

projects.title: RESTful API for Blog Application
projects.description: This RESTful API was developed using Laravel framework.

projects.title: Web-Based Bill Splitter Application
projects.description: This application was developed using React.js and Tailwind CSS.
